hibernate-mapping.query: select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=:alt and (e.cancerType=:tt or e.subtype=:tt)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.cancerType=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.cancerType=? and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.subtype=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and (e.cancerType in (:tts) or e.subtype in (:tt)) and e.evidenceType in (:ets)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.cancerType in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.cancerType in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets) and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.subtype in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and (e.cancerType in (:tts) or e.subtype in (:tts)) and e.evidenceType in (:ets) and e.levelOfEvidence in (:les)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.cancerType in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets) and e.levelOfEvidence in (:les)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.cancerType in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets) and e.levelOfEvidence in (:les) and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts) and e.subtype in (:tts) and e.evidenceType in (:ets) and e.levelOfEvidence in (:les)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.evidenceType=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.levelOfEvidence=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=:alt and e.evidenceType=:et and (e.cancerType=:tt or e.subtype=:tt)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.cancerType=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.cancerType=? and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.subtype=?
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=?
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=? and e.evidenceType=?
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=:g and e.evidenceType=:et and (e.cancerType=:tt or e.subtype=:tt)
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.cancerType=?
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.cancerType=? and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e where e.gene=? and e.evidenceType=? and e.subtype=?
select e from Evidence e where (e.cancerType=:tt or e.subtype=:tt)
select e from Evidence e where e.cancerType=?
select e from Evidence e where e.cancerType=? and e.subtype is null
select e from Evidence e where e.subtype=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where e.gene=:g and (e.cancerType=:tt or e.subtype=:tt)
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where e.gene=? and e.cancerType=?
select e from Evidence e join e.alterations a where e.gene=? and e.subtype=?
select e from Evidence e where e.id in (:ids)
select e from Evidence e where e.uuid in (:uuids)
select distinct e.cancerType, e.subtype from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts)
select distinct e.cancerType from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts)
select distinct e.subtype from Evidence e join e.alterations a where a.id in (:alts)
select distinct e.cancerType from Evidence e where e.cancerType is not null
select distinct e.subtype from Evidence e where e.subtype is not null
select e from Evidence e where e.uuid in (:uuids)
